Name: Total Organic Carbon Analyzer YR04947 - YR04948
Description:
Different from YR04949 and YR04950, YR04947 - YR04948 is equipped with a conductivity detector to quantify TOC. \n \nYR04947 only works under off-line mode while YR04948 integrates on-line sampling mode which enables easy and quick sample introduction under onlinemode. \n \nThey are ideal choice to measure and monitor microelectronics water,purified water, water for injection, etc. \n
Features
\n
    \n
  • Automatic sample introduction with enter of trace sample, we can control the value of the trace sample. No contamination will during testing which will be harmful to human being and environment.
    • \n
  • It adopts UV Catalytic oxidation during which there is no need to add acid, gas or catalytic with low lost of routine maintenance cost.
    • \n
  • 7 inches touch screen with operation panel, which is easy to operate and maintain.
    • \n
  • The system is set with password for protection which is in compliance with FDA-21 CFR Part11 Requirements. Also, it is in compliance with USP32-643 requirements.
    • \n
  • Auto sampler is optional which can be used for testing various different samples without person.
    • \n
  • Special designed for testing water less than 1.5 ppm. Online and office testing function can be easily switched.
    • \n
  • 8GB mass storage memory which does not restrict data and time.
    • \n
  • Less than 3 minutes for each analysis.
    • \n
  • Clear historical records which is traceable according to analysis date.
    • \n
  • Data for specific whole day can be retrieved and saved to USB directly.
    • \n
  • Equipped with Bluetooth printer which is easy to operate and print quickly.
    • \n
  • Modular design ensures quick installation and easy maintenance.
    • \n
  • Optional online monitoring device meets different requirements.
    • \n
\n

Name: Total Organic Carbon Analyzer YR04949
Description:
\n
  • Signal management system of our own national patent which has great advantages of online setting, real-time monitoring, self-testing and flow speed controlling ensure high performance and safe operation.
    • \n
  • Low current system design ensures users safety.
    • \n
  • Different temperature setting for various samples ensures complete sample digestion so as to get more accurate measuring data.
    • \n
  • Adjustable cooling module power according to sampling volume which improves drying performance to ensure dry gas into the detector.
    • \n
  • Automatic leaking check system to avoid operation mistakes, also improves instrument performance and ensures operation safety.
    • \n
  • Flow rate controlling system to avoid any effect caused by flow rate fluctuation which ensures accurate data.
    • \n
  • TOC detector with 24 bits data solution extends monitoring range.
    • \n
  • Controlling system with 32bin processing technology greatly improves performance.
    • \n
\n

Name: Autosampler for Total Organic Carbon Analyzers YR04951
Description:
YR04951 is the autosampler which works with ours YR04947, YR04948, YR04949, YR04950 and YR04950-1 TOC analyzer. \nIt is compact with stable running performance and could save 80% operation time. The positioning system adopts multi-sensors monitoring and ensures high precision. \n
Features
\n
    \n
  • Compact Design,easy to put on bench top.
    • \n
  • 20 positions auto sampling which saves time.
    • \n
  • Easy to use,no need for special training
    • \n
  • Adopts USB to connect with PC.
    • \n
  • Connect with TOC to realize auto-sampling.
    • \n
  • Equipped with Multi-sensors for real-time monitoring to ensure instrument safety.
    • \n
  • Run for long time with good stability ,no need for special maintenance.
    • \n
